myBlog.title: Saliency Detection in Multi-object Images
myBlog.content: There are several studies on saliency detection in single-object images, but there is very limited work done on multi-object images. This project involves developing a relevant dataset and an appropriate algorithm for the same.
myBlog.author: Anurag Sharma
myBlog.metadesc: There are several studies on saliency detection in single-object images, but there is very limited work done on multi-object images. This project involves developing a relevant dataset and an appropriate algorithm for the same.
